snippet: Mr. Ryan has come to be seen as one of his party’s most influential thinkers on fiscal issues, and now many House Republicans want him to be speaker.
abstract: Rep Paul Ryan's focus on budgetary issues may prove to be deciding factor in whether he tries to succeed Speaker John A Boehner, as Ryan may choose to retain his position as chairman of tax-writing Ways and Means Committee; Ryan's budget proposals are reason why his star in Republican Party has risen so swiftly.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ryan has come to be seen as one of his party’s most influential thinkers on fiscal issues, and now many House Republicans want him to be speaker.

headline.main: Devotion to Fiscal Policy May Keep Ryan From Taking House Speaker’s Job
headline.print_headline: Devotion to Fiscal Policy May Drive Ryan to Not Take House Speaker’s Job

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
